title: Public Procurement Supplier Type Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for categorizing suppliers and economic operators in public procurement.

terms.label: Private For-profit Supplier
terms.definition: A privately owned, for-profit organization acting as a supplier or contractor in public procurement.

terms.label: Nonprofit or NGO Supplier
terms.definition: A nonprofit organization, charity, or nongovernmental organization acting as a supplier or service provider in public procurement.

terms.label: Public Enterprise Supplier
terms.definition: A publicly owned enterprise or utility acting as a supplier or contractor in procurement processes.

terms.label: Individual or Sole Trader
terms.definition: An individual person or sole trader acting as a supplier or contractor in procurement processes.

terms.label: Joint Venture or Consortium
terms.definition: A consortium, joint venture, or temporary grouping of suppliers formed to participate in a procurement procedure or contract.

terms.label: Other Supplier Type
terms.definition: A supplier type that does not fit another, more specific category in this vocabulary.
